thread.title: Shark summit seeks high tech safety
thread.title_full: Shark summit seeks high tech safety

author: ABC Radio National
title: Shark summit seeks high tech safety
text:
Shark attacks have crept onto the political agenda in New South Wales after three fatal encounters in the state over the past twelve months. 
Today an international shark summit will meet in Sydney to address community concerns over this issue. 
It will consider a number of new technologies developed to prevent shark attacks, ranging from sonar buoys to electric barriers. 
While technology has come a long way in recent years, there's still no silver bullet when it comes to ensuring the safety of beachgoers when they enter the water.
